name: Small Ingot Processing

items.alias: Gold 2 Sphere Pearl by Peters & Tool

raw: ------------------------------ Ingredients ------------------------------ Small Silver Ingot, Small Gold Ingot and Small Platinum Ingot are used in variety of tradeskill processes. #L "Precious Metal Reclaimer" "150929" #L "Personal Furnace" "150930" A ring or bracer (ie: #L "Flower Ring" "136605") ------------------------------ Recipe ------------------------------ Note: The initial process involves x3.2 in Mechanical Engineering Skill when dealing with Gold, x2.75 in Mechanical Engineering Skill when dealing with Silver both based on the QL of the material Flower Ring + Precious Metal Reclaimer = #L "Small Silver Ingot" "150912" Note: #L "Small Platinum Ingot" "151363" can only be found from Mobs, Dyna & Mission bosses and as chestloot. Silver and Gold ingots can also be tradeskilled from: - #L "Small Gold Ingot" "151369" :#L "Golden Sphere" "136643" - #L "Golden Ring" "136599" - #L "Marriage Ring" "136607" - #L "Bracer of Shielding - Projectile" "84163" - #L "Bracelet of Ka" "136619" - #L "Golden Bracer" "136621" - #L "Golden Nugget" "136631" - #L "Pink Ring" "136615" 84163 84164 84165 84166 84167 84168 84169 84170 84171 84172 84173 84174 - #L "Small Silver Ingot" "150912" :#L Flower Ring" "136605" - #L "OT Ring" "136609" - #L "Silver Nugget" "136635" - #L "Ring of Luck - Defensive" "84142" - #L "Ring of Luck - Offensive" "84143" - #L "Ring of Power - Elements" "84157" - #L "Ring of Suffering" "136617" - #L "Ring of Zern" "136601" - #L "Snake Ring" "136611" - #L "Toe Ring" "136657" - #L "Engagement Ring" "136603" 84175 84176 84177 84178 84179 84180 84181 84182 84183 84184 84185 84186 84147 84148 84149 84150 84153 84154 84155 84156 - Known exceptions (will not melt to ingots): #L "Augmented OT Ring" "160424" - #L "Excellent IQ Ring" "84145" - #L "Failed Ring of Flying" "40828" - #L "Fashionable Energy Ring" "160739" - #L "Silver Pearl" "136653" - #L "Ring of Knowledge" "70255" - #L "Gold 2 Sphere Pearl by Peters & Tool" "25825" - #L "Ring of Presence" "160426" - #L "Ring of the Nucleus Basalis" "202718" - #L "Ring of Thorns" "136613" - #L "Bracer of Growing Flesh" "84187" - #L "Bracer of Shrinking Flesh" "84161" - #L "Bracelet of Pacisfism" "84188" ------------------------------ Note:Melting down metal will take x3 for Silver, x3.4 for Gold and x3.8 for Platinum in Mechanical Engineering Skill based on the QL of the Ingot. Small Silver Ingot + Personal Furnace = #L "Liquid Silver" "150915"
